description: Attaches a key policy to the specified KMS key.

researchLinks.description: Encrypting buckets for compliance and ransom - How Attackers Can Use KMS to Ransomware S3 Buckets

securityImplications: Attackers might put a new key polocy to modify the policy of a current KMS Key and lock the data for ransomware attacks.

simulation.value: aws kms put-key-policy --key-id 1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab --policy-name default --policy "{"Version":"2012-10-17","Id":"key-default-1","Statement":[{"Sid":"Enable IAM User Permissions","Effect":"Allow","Principal":{"AWS":"arn:aws:iam::123456789012:root"},"Action":"kms:*","Resource":"*"}]}"
